title: (x) Snoop Dogg "Rhythm & Gangsta" gothic album logo - custom lettering {Andreas}
content:
HELP!!!! I WANT THIS FONT!!! pls help!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010043639im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SnoopLogo_5438.jpg)

Pls HELP ...:P
author: Thug

comments.content:
This is Snoop Gothic and very custom.  
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R&G\_(Rhythm\_&\_Gangsta)\_The\_Masterpiece  
Mr. Cartoon - Cover artwork design

-- [astype.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010043639/http:/www.astype.de/)--
sooo were iz the font?:( can't see it..:P

Da letters are custom pimped for da snoopy dogg warez. :-)

-- [astype.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010043639/http:/www.astype.de/)--
There is no font for it, it was all hand lettered.
I created a digital version for Snoop's production company & Pony Shoes' Doggybiscuitz shoe line, but it is not available publicly.

I wouldn't have thought it was terribly critical. Looking at what appears to be an album cover by this artiste (shows age) in [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010043639/http:/typophile.com/node/7572) thread, any blackletter would seem to be acceptable.

OT: What is a "Rhythm Gangsta" anyway? my guess is a woman who only robs banks during particular phases of her menstrual cycle.

But I could be wrong.
Richard: You may have missed the Ampersand, although that does not make it clear either at least to me ;)

<cite>Da letters are custom pimped for da snoopy dogg warez. :-)</cite>

Well said.
Stephan, I see it now. But I'm still uncertain ;-)
Why was this posted three times?

fo shizzle.

----------  
**Paul Ducco**  
 [Solid Creative - Motion Graphics Design, Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010043639/http:/www.solid-creative.com/motion.htm)

\> _Why was this posted three times?_

Cuz da top dawg wuz hangin' at da pool sippin' juice, so I didn't see dis thread, otherwise I'd a clipped one in da perp's a$$, know what I mean?

MC Baldie, top dawg on semi-holiday
It's no longer "popped a cap in his…" man I'm out of touch with the times.
As if I knew what I was writing! :^D You could very well be right, fo shizzle.
Muh belgizzle frienizzle, u iz all that and a bag of chips. hmmmhmmm.

Is there a special set of Unicode points for this language you are all speaking?  
Code page: Snoopdog extended B

ChrisL
where can i find the font at?? preferabley it writin a-z

As Ian Lynam already said, it's not available to the public.

- Lex
izz it got da froggy's ligs, or does dat cost mo' bling?

Ain't no bling can touch the thing,  
can't get connected, gg gets rejected;  
Snoop may be top dog but he gits no frog,  
Check it out on da Phinney's blog;  
Costs two geez to make ligs pleaze,  
da Snoop might make it wit seven c's.

ChrisL

look at !

[http://typophile.com/node/7572](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010043639/http:/typophile.com/node/7572 "http://typophile.com/node/7572")
so after reading all this blog, does anyone know where there is ANY font that is like this that if downloadable for free????????
oops I meant is downloadable for free. My bad :op

[Dieter Steffmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010043639/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/) is the king of free blackletter fonts.
